supplier_of: holiday farm for school trips | travel and tourism
information: Château Beaumont is a residential activity centre situated in the Loire Valley, for schools and youth groups from the UK and Internationally. Château Beaumont is unusual in the sector because many of our staff return year after year; our senior management team is well established and contains several ex-centre managers who know what it is like to work on the exciting and rewarding front line. We are currently recruiting for qualified kitchen staff and enthusiastic group leaders interested in early responsibility and the chance to live in France or at our UK activity centre in Northumberland. With our emphasis placed firmly on the experience for children and students alike, we expect our staff to be enthusiastic and inspirational role models for young people.
keywords: Travel and tourism, holiday farm for school trips
